base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 10 nodes and 14 branches in this circuit. The passive components include 7 resistor(s). Energy is supplied through 4 voltage source(s), 1 current source(s). Additionally, 2 controlled source(s) are present. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 14 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the resistive element 1 parameter from 44mΩ to 200mΩ.
Change the DC voltage source (labeled 2) from 92V to 9V.
Replace the 43V voltage source (3) with a 215V one.
